name: Notion Recipe Manager Template
description: UPDATEIf you like this template you might wanna try its updated versioncheck it out here------------------------------------------------------------This is an app-like recipe manager template. It's super useful for organizing your favourite recipes and the ones you want to try too. It has an embedded timer widget and a unit converter. And, a built-in food stickers gallery. The feature I love the most though is the ability to instantly scale your ingredients to change the servings number.You can
